Question: Guangzhou New Design Biotechnology  Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Guangzhou New-Design Biotechnology Co., Ltd

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- Home medical health supplies industry focus
- 10 product series including moxibustion instruments, massage, and medical beauty
- Factory with 20,000 square meter coverage and daily capacity of 3000 sets
- Strict product quality control through DQE, SQE, FQC, and CQE
- Mission: Make physical therapy easier
- Vision: Be the best home therapy equipment group
- Value: Share, Study, Break, Pragmatic, and Energy
- Contact Information:
  - Address: No.101 building No.1, ING Cultural Valley, No.265 Chigang West road, Haizhu District, Guangzhou, China
  - Tel: +86 20 62312008
  - Email: lina@gznewdesign.com
  - Mobile/Wechat/Whatsapp: +86 138 2508 8528
Summary_cn:
广州新世纪生物科技有限公司

CES 2024产品亮点：

- 家庭医疗保健用品行业专注
- 10个产品系列，包括艾灸仪器、按摩和医疗美容
- 工厂占地面积2万平方米，每日产能3000套
- 通过DQE、SQE、FQC和CQE进行严格的产品质量控制
- 使物理疗法更加简便的使命
- 成为最佳家庭疗法设备集团的愿景
- 价值观：分享、研究、突破、务实和活力
